hero.title: Welcome to the
hero.subtitle: New Internet
hero.text: For every dreamer, creator, and change-maker tired of the old internet, Web3 is here. ENS is more than a protocol - it's a commitment to a better web, built for everyone.

features.title: Your name
features.text: Your ENS name is anchored in Web3, but works across the internet. It's your identity: simple, memorable, unmistakably yours.

farewell.title: Farewell to complexity.
farewell.text: No more confusing hex addresses. Your ENS name is easy to remember, easy to share.

animation.m1: What's your crypto address so I can pay you?
animation.m4:
This is so much simpler! Send to
mynewname.eth

consistent.title: Consistent across the internet.
consistent.text: Keep your identity consistent across all services and platforms effortlessly. Say goodbye to juggling multiple usernames.

ownership.title: True ownership.
ownership.text: Your ENS name is 100% yours. No intermediaries, no bureaucracy. It's your property—uncensored and irrevocable.

gyow.title: Blaze your own trail
gyow.description: Discover your unique path in the ENS ecosystem. Wherever you begin, we’re all moving towards a better internet.

ens-app.title: ENS App
ens-app.description: Your ENS journey begins here, by registering your name.

ens-dao.title: ENS DAO
ens-dao.description: Join the ENS community to contribute alongside a global collective.

docs.title: Developer Docs
docs.description: You're a developer, and you want to build on the new internet.

gateway.title: Your gateway to the New Internet
gateway.description: Envision a world where the internet and Web3 seamlessly connect, creating a unified, innovative experience.

partners.description: These partners are revolutionizing the internet alongside ENS, creating new standards and forging strong alliances.

governance.title: A public good, shaped by you
governance.description: ENS is a community-driven non-profit. Join us in creating an internet where everyone has a voice.

community.title: Join our community
community.description: Be part of the movement transforming the internet. Connect with like-minded individuals, share ideas, and collaborate on projects that make a difference.

hero.title:
Build in good
 company
hero.text: Join a community of innovators and developers crafting a better internet. Whether you're new to Web3 or a seasoned pro, ENS is your gateway to a trustless web.

ccip-read.description: Learn about CCIP Read (EIP-3668), a protocol for cross-chain interoperability enabling contracts to retrieve external data via offchain lookups.

unruggable-gateway.description: Explore the Unruggable Gateway, a generic solution for fetching state proofs of data across EVM chains using CCIP-Read.

thorin.description: Discover Thorin, a design system for ENS created with React and styled-components.

tg.title: Developer Telegram
tg.description: Join our Developer Telegram channel to ask questions and get insights on building with ENS.

quickstart.title: New to Web3?
quickstart.description: Our guides will get you started quickly and easily.

pro.title: For the Web3 wizards
pro.description: Dive into our comprehensive developer documentation.

grants.title: Grants for Game-Changers
grants.text: Got a groundbreaking idea? Our grants are here to power your innovative projects within the ENS ecosystem.

bounty.title:
Our Bug Bounty:
Your Peace of Mind
bounty.text: We prioritize security above all. Explore our bug bounty program and contribute to a more secure platform with rewards up to $250,000.

hero.title: Trusted by the
hero.subtitle: New Internet
hero.text: ENS is a community of pioneers, collectively shaping a more intuitive and trustworthy internet. It's not just about being part of Web3; it's about leading it.

foundation.title: Build Your Web3 Presence
foundation.description: Join us to position your brand at the forefront of the new internet.

trust.title: Unparalleled Trust
trust.description: Trust isn't a buzzword, it's our foundation. As a non-profit, DAO-governed protocol, we're committed to security and integrity.

resources.title: Explore With Us
resources.description: Discover how ENS can amplify your organization with additional resources.

partner.title: Partner with us
partner.description: Want to collaborate? Connect with our Business Development team to explore partnership opportunities.

hero.title:
Your platform
for change
hero.text: Our DAO is the lifeblood of our decentralized ethos. Designed for longevity, the DAO nurtures ENS's resilience and flexibility, evolving through a tapestry of community voices.

join.title: Join the New Internet
join.text: Your engagement in ENS governance is more than a vote. It is your stake in an internet that is democratic, resilient, and truly centered around its users.

vote.title: Your vote, your voice
vote.text: $ENS isn't just a token – it's your key to making meaningful change in the ENS ecosystem. 1 token = 1 vote. $ENS tokens empower you to shape ENS's future.

delegation.title: Empower through delegation
delegation.text: By delegating tokens to active contributors in our community, you're not just participating – you're amplifying the impact you wish to see.

grants.title: Grants for Game-Changers
grants.text: Got a groundbreaking idea? Our grants are here to power your innovative projects within the ENS ecosystem.

forum.title: DAO Forum
forum.description: Join the DAO Forum to discuss new ideas.

header.title: ENS Brand
header.description:
You're free to use the ENS brand in the ecosystem, but we must grant you a license before you do. Reach out to our General Counsel, Alexander Urbelis, at alex@ens[.]domains, to request a trademark license agreement.

 Just remember, don't use it to pretend to be ENS, ENS DAO, or ENS Labs, or to suggest a partnership that does not exist because those sorts of things will violate the license.

assets.title: Brand Assets
assets.description: ENS's brand can be represented using any of our colors, but we prefer Blue, Black, and White.

symbol.title: Symbol
symbol.description: This is the main and preferred icon for using ENS-branded assets.

lockup.title: Lock-up
lockup.description: Utilize the full lock-up when you need to show the full ENS branded asset. This is also useful for more horizontally-aligned assets.

guidelines.title: Usage Guidelines
guidelines.description: You can download a PDF version of the ENS brand guidelines which include detailed documentation on how to use brand colours, assets and typography. If you’re unsure of our guidelines and how your project would align, please get in touch.

space.title: Clear Space
space.description:
Make sure there is enough clear space when using the logo, such that there is enough room for everything to breathe.
A good rule of thumb is at least 1/3 of the width of the ENS symbol.

token.title: Icon
token.description: The icon is used to represents ENS as an avatar and the $ENS token.

palette.title: Brand Palette
palette.description: ENS's brand can be represented using any of our colors. Please keep in mind that the colors are not a “one-size-fits-all”.

primary.title: Primary Palette
primary.description: Below is the primary color palette for the ENS brand.

secondary.title: Extended Color Palette
secondary.description: Below are the scondary color palettes to be used for creating creative collateral for the ENS brand.

partnerships.title: Partnerships
partnerships.description: An official partnership with us means joining forces to create impactful solutions. This might include;

list.1: Integration of your product into ENS or the manager app,
list.2: Co-Marketing efforts with the ENS DAO or ENS Labs,
list.3: R&D collaboration with the ENS DAO or ENS Labs.

partnerships.extra: Partnerships may use the ENS Brand where needed, but they must not modify or change the logo.

ecosystem.title: Ecosystem
ecosystem.description: If you’re building on ENS without an official partnership, you’re an Ecosystem builder. This might include;

list.1: Integration of ENS into your product,
list.2: A creative project designed by and for ENS users.

ecosystem.extra: Modification of the logo is discouraged, but not forbidden if it is for creative purposes. However the brand cannot be used to imply an official partnership with ENS DAO or ENS Labs.
